participant_1.background:
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.
i am getting married next week.
I plan to spend my retirement reading all the books I never had time for.
I don't know much about my parents because they left me when I was young.
I take my dog for a walk after I wake up.

participant_2.background:
I like to check out the latest aviation news and ballet events on my favorite websites.
i m tired of having to read subtitles.
I'm moving to a new house so I can have more space for my book collection.
i am an animal rights activist.
I sometimes spend too much time procrastinating on my homework.

content.text: Hi there! My day is going well, thank you for asking!  What's up with you?
I am doing well too! I am just getting ready to go on a hike with my hiking group.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I'm not much of a hiker, but I love animals and the outdoors.
Yeah, it is really nice to get out and enjoy nature.  I love hiking with my family, and we are planning to go on a hike in the Rockies next month.
Wow, that sounds amazing!  I've never been to the Rockies, but I've heard they are beautiful.  My family and I are planning to go on a road trip to the Grand Canyon next summer.
That sounds like a great trip!  I've never been to the Grand Canyon either, but I've heard it is amazing.  I'm sure you will have a great time.
Thanks!  I'm excited to start planning it.
Me too!  I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
I'm sure it will be!  What do you like to do in your free time?
In my free time, I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family and friends.  What about you?
I like to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family and friends too.  I also like to volunteer at my local animal shelter.
That's great!  I love animals too.  I volunteer at my local animal shelter as well.
That's awesome!  It's so important to help out animals in need.
I agree!  It's one of the most rewarding things I do.
Me too!  It's so nice to see the animals get happy and healthy.
Yeah, it is really great.  I'm glad you are a volunteer.
Thanks!  I'm glad you are too
